text: Chief John Big Tree (born Isaac Johnny John, June 2, 1877 â€“ July 6, 1967) was a member of the Seneca nation and an actor. His acting career was from 1915 to 1950. He played Native Americans and chiefs of Native Americans in films. He played in many Western movies.Matheson, Sue. The John Ford Encyclopedia. United States: Rowman & Littlefield Publishers, 2019, p. 22. == Related pages == * Seneca Nation * Seneca people * Western (film) == References == Category:1877 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Native American people
